snippet: Forty Illinois state troopers are being sent to help the city’s police department combat street violence during what is typically the most dangerous time of year.
abstract: Forty Illinois state troopers are ordered to Chicago to help police department combat street violence for at least one month, during what is typically city's most dangerous period of the year.
lead_paragraph: Forty Illinois state troopers are being sent to help the city’s police department combat street violence during what is typically the most dangerous time of year.

headline.main: Illinois: Troopers to Aid Chicago Police
headline.print_headline: Illinois: Troopers to Aid Chicago Police
